titleStmt.title: Times anotomie [sic]. Containing: the poore mans plaint, Brittons trouble, and her triumph. The Popes pride, Romes treasons, and her destruction: affirming, that Gog, and Magog, both shall perish, the Church of Christ shall flourish, Iudeas race shall be restored, and the manner how this mightie worke shall be accomplished. Made by Robert Pricket, a souldier: and dedicated to all the lords of his Maiesties most honourable priuie Councell.
titleStmt.author: Pricket, Robert.

publicationStmt.publisher: By George Eld, and are to be sold by Iohn Hodgets,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
